title: bought IP boost instead of gifting it and submitted a ticket
body: hi. i had some rp on one account of mine and i wanted to gift IP booost to my main account, but im so stupid, instead of gifting it, i ended up buying it. Im new to using rp, and i didnt know there was a gifing center, i thought we should buy the item and then we can gift it to another person. I know riot doesnt refund boosts, but i had sent a ticket to them saying the situation and if they can transfer the boost to my actual account.  IM just wondering, how long do they take to reply to tickets, and since ill be waiting for them to respond, what if the boost actually runs out? have i just wasted a lot of money?

replies.body: Gifting boosts are currently unavailable, sorry for the confusion.  :(  If you haven't used it, we may be able to work something out.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)  and we'll look into this with you directly!

wow thats surprising.... well i did play one or two urf games.. but i dont mind if they take back the ip i got from that.. i have submited a ticket, but what my other worry is that, if this takes time to be resolved, i would have a idle boost running and going for a waste...where i dont use it on either accounts.  i hope they consider the boost time being wasted, things cost money and money isnt so easy to come by for everyone for games....and also thank you for taking the time to respond, really appreciate it!

have a good day
